reviewText: Not bad but could be better the movie

Unlike other flight videos from this company, the 747 video has sound issues that make it unpleasant / difficult to watch. Specifically in the cockpit there are loud radio communications during most of the time the captain is speaking and during the flight's radio communication with ground. It is very distracting to an otherwise good video.
The other comment I would make, is that the captain tends to talk too much about unrelated things - at one point seemingly doing a Boeing commercial.
I bought previous series on Air France A380 and B777...very pleased
